meanings.definition: Involving or characterized by an extreme paradox
meanings.sent1: The situation was ultraparadoxical, making it hard to understand.
meanings.sent2: Her ultraparadoxical statement left everyone confused.
meanings.sent3: It was ultraparadoxical how the cat chased the dog instead of the other way around.
meanings.sent4: The ultraparadoxical nature of time seemed to bend reality itself.
meanings.sent5: The concept of infinity is truly ultraparadoxical in nature.

meanings.definition: Beyond what is logically possible or comprehensible
meanings.sent1: The magician's ultraparadoxical trick amazed the audience.
meanings.sent2: The ultraparadoxical theory challenged the limits of human understanding.
meanings.sent3: It was ultraparadoxical how the cake disappeared from the table.
meanings.sent4: The ultraparadoxical nature of the universe baffled scientists.
meanings.sent5: The idea of parallel universes is truly ultraparadoxical.
